answers.answer: I feel the same way a lot of times ive had posts that have got no responses i think people try to just respond to things they have experienced and others just keep scrolling and it doesnt take long for a post to get moved down the list and missed.
The posts disappear so quickly. I know mine did. But shoot away!
I have to much fluid will it go away by itself
I really don't know about too much fluid. ..what did your doc say?

First, I don't ever think it is personal if a post goes unanswered.  If the question is too technical, people may fear giving you a wrong answer.  So they skip it hoping someone else will know how to help you OR it is a question they just answered for someone else 3 minutes ago.  The other thing that happens is that the pregnancy forums are SO busy that questions slide down the page VERY quickly and can be overlooked.Swelling.  Are you talking about like in your ankles and face?  Limit salt intake, elevate feet.What do you mean by too much fluid though.

Im not swollen she said I have to much fluid like I have gestational diabetes but she told me to cut out carbs and sweets and drink plenty of water and I go see her in a week but what if it doesn't fix itself
I think it just depends on what tine of the day you post, orbits not a busy time of day your post will dissappear as a. Okd one quickly. I have never seen your name! So I bet that's what happens
Then we will put you on watch and you will have to check your sugar more than 3 times a day nothing too too bad but you will have to just make sure you and the baby are fine
